title: T213-2 Wantlist -- Last few for the set

posts.post_title: T213-2 Wantlist -- Last few for the set
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Andy Cook
I am interested in buying/trading for these last 11 T213-2s to finish my set. I'm extremely flexible on condition -- the only qualifier is the caption must be readable. I have stuff to trade at [url]http://members.aol.com/typecard/trade.html[/url] and I could come up with other stuff as well to make it work. Thanks, Andy typecard@aol.com

T213-2 Wantlist
Brown (Chicago)
Crandall (St Louis Nat)
Demmitt (NY on shirt)
Magee (Phila)
McQuillan (Phila)
Murray (Chicago)
Reulbach (Brooklyn Fed)
Sweeney (Richmond)
Tinker (Chicago Nat Bat on Shoulder)
Wheat (Brooklyn)
Wiltse (Brooklyn Portrait)
